name: Trick Me or Treat Me
description:
Trick Me or Treat Me

The main objective of the game is to have the color of the fire match to the coming slime. If they are not match, the slime will be killed. Else, they will enjoy the treat before going home.

Controls

Click anywhere in the game to change the color of the fire.

Credits to the following
  • Food by Sanglorian- https://opengameart.org/content/64-16x16-food-sprites
  • Slimes by Calciumtrice- https://opengameart.org/content/animated-slime
  • TileMap by Calciumtrice- https://opengameart.org/content/outdoor-tileset
  • BGM by TinyWorlds - https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop
Created by: lpancho a.k.a FatFat05
